title: Directs the division for small business to maintain a small business portal on the department of economic development's website
summary: Directs the division for small business to maintain a small business portal on the department of economic development's internet website; provides such portal shall be a one-stop source of information to existing and prospective small businesses.

       AN  ACT  to amend the economic development law, in relation to directing

    1    S 3. The division for small business  shall  periodically  assess  the
    2  extent  to  which the small business web portal provided for in subdivi-
    3  sion 12 of section 134 of the economic development law  is  serving  the
    4  needs  of  existing  and prospective owners and operators of small busi-
    5  nesses,  through  such  measures  as  user  surveys, online feedback and
    6  soliciting input from the advisory board provided for in section 133  of
    7  the  economic  development  law. Such division shall update the services
    8  offered through such portal to reflect additional needed services  iden-
    9  tified through such assessments.
   10    S 4. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
   11  it shall have become a law.
